projects.title: Disasters
projects.description: Displays Earthquakes filtered by date and magnitude. Information about the earthquake and a visual minimap is displayed where each earthquake took place.

projects.title: Portfolio Website 2.0
projects.description: My second and current attempt at a personal website, created to display the various projects and places I've worked. This is webpage is built with React from the Create React App template and Material UI. I self-taught myself React and this is my first React project, and through it, I am learning the usefulness and importance of reusable and custom components.

projects.title: Spotify Sleep Cycle
projects.description: A React Native mobile app for Spotify and alarm integration. If you are tired of normal alarm sounds, this will let you wake up to a Spotify playlist. This app is still in development, but I am continuously working on it

projects.title: Student Manager
projects.description: Attendance app that helps manage flow of students. Logs when students check in and out. Notifies parents when students have checked out via email or text

projects.title: Portfolio Website 1.0
projects.description: My first attempt at a personal website. This is a full stack portfolio web app using MEAN stack. I went a bit overkill by adding a backend database and Node server to control the contact form and store data of messages. It is organized according to standard MVC patterns.
